description: Test cases for MediaWiki indented code blocks (lines starting with space)

cases.name: Indented code block followed by list
cases.wikitext:
Entries in "adjacencies.csv" take the format:
    ID From;ID To;Type;ID Through;start_x;start_y;stop_x;stop_y;Comment
    #For example:
    1527;1526;river_large;629;948;2791;-1;-1;London-Southwark
    -1;-1;;-1;-1;-1;-1;-1;
* ID From, ID To, and ID Through are all ID
cases.expected:
Entries in "adjacencies.csv" take the format:
```
   ID From;ID To;Type;ID Through;start_x;start_y;stop_x;stop_y;Comment
   #For example:
   1527;1526;river_large;629;948;2791;-1;-1;London-Southwark
   -1;-1;;-1;-1;-1;-1;-1;
```
